original_text: Then the herald loudly proclaimed, “Nations and peoples of every language, this is what you are commanded to do:
korean_text: 선포하는 자가 크게 외쳐 이르되 백성들과 나라들과 각 언어로 말하는 자들아 왕이 너희 무리에게 명하시나니

sentences.original_text: Nations and peoples of every language,
this is what you are commanded to do:
